name: Final Lullaby
content: And you'll always be on my mind
And I can't make you stay
And I hope you find peace
我希望你能找到内心的安宁
Close your eyes as I put us to sleep
闭上你的眼睛 我们缓缓入睡
And I can't make you stay
And I hope you find peace
我希望你能找到内心的安宁
Close your eyes as I put us to sleep
闭上你的眼睛 我们缓缓入睡
你会找到内心的安宁吧
Close your eyes and I put us to sleep
闭上你的眼睛 我们缓缓入睡
